element.name: Patient Activity
element.definition: The activity the patient was involved in at the time the patient experienced the onset of symptoms or experienced an injury.
element.v3Comment:
Code list is represented in ICD-10-CM: Diagnoses Codes. This list will only contain specific Y codes, see suggested NEMSIS list of activity codes (Y93).
Code list is represented in ICD-10 Codes.
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus
